TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRelDecryptor

summary.span: Define métodos que descriptografam um elemento XrML .

span.span: Defines methods that decrypt an XrML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use o interface com o classe para descriptografar um XrML `` elemento.Use the interface with the class to decrypt an XrML `` element. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como validar uma assinatura digital XML usando o interface e o classe.The following code example shows how to validate an XML digital signature using the interface and the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform/cpp/sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform/VB/sample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Stream Decrypt (System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod encryptionMethod, System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo keyInfo, System.IO.Stream toDecrypt);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream Decrypt(class System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod encryptionMethod, class System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo keyInfo, class System.IO.Stream toDecrypt) cil managed
public: System::IO::Stream ^ Decrypt(System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::EncryptionMethod ^ encryptionMethod, System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::KeyInfo ^ keyInfo, System::IO::Stream ^ toDecrypt);
abstract member Decrypt : System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod * System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo * System.IO.Stream -> System.IO.Stream

param.name: encryptionMethod
param.span: Um objeto que encapsula o algoritmo usado para a criptografia XML.

span.span: An object that encapsulates the algorithm used for XML encryption.

param.name: keyInfo
param.span: Um objeto que contém uma chave assimétrica a ser usada para descriptografia.

span.span: A object that contains an asymmetric key to use for decryption.

param.name: toDecrypt
param.span: Um objeto de fluxo que contém um elemento a descriptografar.

span.span: A stream object that contains an element to decrypt.

summary.span: Descriptografa um elemento XrML que está contido dentro de um objeto .

span.span: Decrypts an XrML element that is contained within a object.

returns.span: Um objeto que contém um elemento descriptografado.

span.span: A object that contains a decrypted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método descriptografa um XrML `` elemento e retorna um fluxo de texto sem formatação.The method decrypts an XrML `` element and returns a plaintext stream.
